resources.string: If the orb you clicked is incorrect, please report it to help improve the image classification in future app updates.
To get started, take a picture of the board. To get the most reliable results, the board should cover most of the picture.

The board will be detected from the picture, and a list of all the possible moves will be displayed. The moves that result in an extra turn will be at the top, followed by the moves that match the most orbs.
